review: This is a cool tool for watching YouTube and Netflix. Both my Samsung support YouTube and Netflix, but they are so freaking slow and buggy that using the Chromecast makes me jump for joy. It is so easy to use and navigate using my android phone. My only wish is that it support DLNA and HDMI CEC. It would be great to stream video direct from my phone or Windows PC and not just from the internet. I would also like to be able to pause/rewind etc using my TV remote, which the HDMI CEC would allow for. That would make the user experience much cleaner. I always forget I am watching a movie through Chromecast and try to use my TV remote to pause, which does not work. It supports CEC a little bit, in that it will turn on my TV automatically when I use Chromecast, but a little more functionality would be awesome.
